CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 8, 1949, pg. 5, reads: "On Carver Broadcast - James Murray, station manager of KQV, Pittsburgh Mutual Broadcasting Station, and Mrs. Alma Illery, founder and president of the National Achievement Clubs, Inc., go over the coast-to-coast network program set for Wednesday, Jan. 5, at 10:30 P. M. The program is a feature of the annual George Washington Carver celebration. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Alma Illery and James Murray seated behind microphone in KQV Radio Station, another version
